name: Home Stay
description: What would make my trip special: I will introduce you to the beautiful city of Dublin, it's culture, it's history and art. I will help you to get the best pictures for your memories. I am willing to listen to any proposal. If the team have any particular requests , I am more the happy to accommodate. I will promise you a wonderful experience, ( and we can even review your pictures together over a lovely pint of Guinness!)
